Math.max(...validSamples) : 0,\n      samples: [...this.samples],\n      timestamp: Date.now(),\n    }\n  }\n\n  getHistory(): number[] {\n    return [...this.history]\n  }\n\n  isWarning(): boolean {\n    return this.fps &lt; this.warningThreshold &amp;&amp; this.fps &gt; 0\n  }\n\n  getWarningThreshold(): number {\n    return this.warningThreshold\n  }\n\n  setWarningThreshold(threshold: number): void {\n    this.warningThreshold = threshold\n  }\n\n  reset(): void {\n    this.samples = []\n    this.history = []\n    this.fps = 0\n    this.frameCount = 0\n    this.lastTime = performance.now()\n  }\n\n  destroy(): void {\n    this.stop()\n    this.reset()\n    this.onUpdate = undefined\n  }\n}\n\n// å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼\nlet fpsMonitor: FPSMonitor | null = null\n\nexport function initFPSMonitor(options?: FPSMonitorOptions): FPSMonitor {\n  if (!fpsMonitor) {\n    fpsMonitor = new FPSMonitor(options)\n  }\n  return fpsMonitor\n}\n\nexport function getFPSMonitor(): FPSMonitor | null {\n  return fpsMonitor\n}\n\nexport function destroyFPSMonitor(): void {\n  if (fpsMonitor) {\n    fpsMonitor.destroy()\n    fpsMonitor = null\n  }\n}\n\nexport { FPSMonitor }\n",

{\n        for (const entry of list.getEntries()) {\n          if (entry.name === 'first-contentful-paint') {\n            this.fcpValue = entry.startTime\n          }\n        }\n      })\n      observer.observe({ type: 'paint', buffered: true })\n    }\n    catch (e) {\n      // PerformanceObserver ä¸æ”¯æŒ\n    }\n\n    // ç›‘å¬ LCP\n    try {\n      const lcpObserver = new PerformanceObserver((list) =&gt; {\n        const entries = list.getEntries()\n        const lastEntry = entries[entries.length - 1]\n        if (lastEntry) {\n          this.lcpValue = lastEntry.startTime\n        }\n      })\n      lcpObserver.observe({ type: 'largest-contentful-paint', buffered: true })\n    }\n    catch (e) {\n      // LCP ä¸æ”¯æŒ\n    }\n\n    // ç›‘å¬ FID\n    try {\n      const fidObserver = new PerformanceObserver((list) =&gt; {\n        for (const entry of list.getEntries()) {\n          const fidEntry = entry as PerformanceEventTiming\n          if (fidEntry.processingStart) {\n            this.fidValue = fidEntry.processingStart - entry.startTime\n          }\n        }\n      })\n      fidObserver.observe({ type: 'first-input', buffered: true })\n    }\n    catch (e) {\n      // FID ä¸æ”¯æŒ\n    }\n\n    // ç›‘å¬ CLS\n    try {\n      let clsValue = 0\n      const clsObserver = new PerformanceObserver((list) =&gt; {\n        for (const entry of list.getEntries()) {\n          const layoutShiftEntry = entry as unknown as { hadRecentInput: boolean, value: number }\n          if (!layoutShiftEntry.hadRecentInput) {\n            clsValue += layoutShiftEntry.value\n            this.clsValue = clsValue\n          }\n        }\n      })\n      clsObserver.observe({ type: 'layout-shift', buffered: true })\n    }\n    catch (e) {\n      // CLS ä¸æ”¯æŒ\n    }\n  }\n\n  start(): void {\n    if (this.isRunning)\n      return\n    this.isRunning = true\n    this.update()\n    this.intervalId = window.setInterval(() =&gt; this.update(), this.updateInterval)\n  }\n\n  stop(): void {\n    this.isRunning = false\n    if (this.intervalId !== null) {\n      clearInterval(this.intervalId)\n      this.intervalId = null\n    }\n  }\n\n  private update(): void {\n    const metrics = this.getMetrics()\n\n    // è®°å½•å†…å­˜å†å²\n    if (metrics.memory) {\n      this.memoryHistory.push(metrics.memory.usedJSHeapSize)\n      if (this.memoryHistory.length &gt; this.maxHistoryLength) {\n        this.memoryHistory.shift()\n      }\n    }\n\n    if (this.onUpdate) {\n      this.onUpdate(metrics)\n    }\n  }\n\n  getMetrics(): PerformanceMetrics {\n    return {\n      memory: this.getMemoryInfo(),\n      domNodes: this.getDOMNodeCount(),\n      eventListeners: this.estimateEventListeners(),\n      loadTime: this.getLoadTime(),\n      fcp: this.fcpValue,\n      lcp: this.lcpValue,\n      fid: this.fidValue,\n      cls: this.clsValue,\n      timestamp: Date.now(),\n    }\n  }\n\n  private getMemoryInfo(): MemoryInfo | null {\n    // @ts-expect-error - memory API åªåœ¨ Chrome ä¸­å¯ç”¨\n    const memory = performance.memory\n    if (!memory)\n      return null\n\n    const usedJSHeapSize = memory.usedJSHeapSize / (1024 * 1024)\n    const totalJSHeapSize = memory.totalJSHeapSize / (1024 * 1024)\n    const jsHeapSizeLimit = memory.jsHeapSizeLimit / (1024 * 1024)\n\n    return {\n      usedJSHeapSize: Math.round(usedJSHeapSize * 100) / 100,\n      totalJSHeapSize: Math.round(totalJSHeapSize * 100) / 100,\n      jsHeapSizeLimit: Math.round(jsHeapSizeLimit * 100) / 100,\n      usagePercentage: Math.round((usedJSHeapSize / jsHeapSizeLimit) * 100),\n    }\n  }\n\n  private getDOMNodeCount(): number {\n    return document.getElementsByTagName('*').length\n  }\n\n  private estimateEventListeners(): number {\n    // è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç²—ç•¥çš„ä¼°ç®—\n    // çœŸæ­£çš„äº‹ä»¶ç›‘å¬å™¨æ•°é‡éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡ Chrome DevTools è·å–\n    let count = 0\n    const allElements = document.getElementsByTagName('*')\n    for (let i = 0; i &lt; allElements.length; i++) {\n      const element = allElements[i]\n      // æ£€æŸ¥å¸¸è§çš„å†…è”äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†å™¨\n      const inlineEvents = [\n        'onclick',\n        'onmousedown',\n        'onmouseup',\n        'onmouseover',\n        'onmouseout',\n        'onmousemove',\n        'onkeydown',\n        'onkeyup',\n        'onkeypress',\n        'onfocus',\n        'onblur',\n        'onchange',\n        'oninput',\n        'onsubmit',\n        'onscroll',\n        'onload',\n        'onerror',\n      ]\n      for (const event of inlineEvents) {\n        if ((element as any)[event]) {\n          count++\n        }\n      }\n    }\n    return count\n  }\n\n  private getLoadTime(): number {\n    const navigation = performance.getEntriesByType('navigation')[0] as PerformanceNavigationTiming\n    if (navigation) {\n      return Math.round(navigation.loadEventEnd - navigation.startTime)\n    }\n    return 0\n  }\n\n  getMemoryHistory(): number[] {\n    return [...this.memoryHistory]\n  }\n\n  reset(): void {\n    this.memoryHistory = []\n    this.fcpValue = null\n    this.lcpValue = null\n    this.fidValue = null\n    this.clsValue = null\n  }\n\n  destroy(): void {\n    this.stop()\n    this.reset()\n    this.onUpdate = undefined\n  }\n}\n\n// å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼\nlet performanceMonitor: PerformanceMonitor | null = null\n\nexport function initPerformanceMonitor(options?: PerformanceMonitorOptions): PerformanceMonitor {\n  if (!performanceMonitor) {\n    performanceMonitor = new PerformanceMonitor(options)\n  }\n  return performanceMonitor\n}\n\nexport function getPerformanceMonitor(): PerformanceMonitor | null {\n  return performanceMonitor\n}\n\nexport function destroyPerformanceMonitor(): void {\n  if (performanceMonitor) {\n    performanceMonitor.destroy()\n    performanceMonitor = null\n  }\n}\n\nexport { PerformanceMonitor }\n",

{\n      if (value === null)\n        return 'rgba(255,255,255,0.6)'\n\n      switch (type) {\n        case 'fcp':\n          return value &lt; 1800 ? '#42b883' : value &lt; 3000 ? '#ffd93d' : '#ff6b6b'\n        case 'lcp':\n          return value &lt; 2500 ? '#42b883' : value &lt; 4000 ? '#ffd93d' : '#ff6b6b'\n        case 'fid':\n          return value &lt; 100 ? '#42b883' : value &lt; 300 ? '#ffd93d' : '#ff6b6b'\n        case 'cls':\n          return value &lt; 0.1 ? '#42b883' : value &lt; 0.25 ? '#ffd93d' : '#ff6b6b'\n        default:\n          return 'rgba(255,255,255,0.6)'\n      }\n    }\n\n    section.innerHTML = &#96;\n      &lt;div style=\"margin-top: 8px; padding-top: 8px; border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);\"&gt;\n        &lt;div style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.6); margin-bottom: 4px; font-size: 10px;\"&gt;Web Vitals&lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;div style=\"display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 4px; font-size: 10px;\"&gt;\n          &lt;div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between;\"&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\"&gt;FCP&lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: ${getVitalColor('fcp', fcp)};\"&gt;${formatValue(fcp, 'ms')}&lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between;\"&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\"&gt;LCP&lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: ${getVitalColor('lcp', lcp)};\"&gt;${formatValue(lcp, 'ms')}&lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between;\"&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\"&gt;FID&lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: ${getVitalColor('fid', fid)};\"&gt;${formatValue(fid, 'ms')}&lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between;\"&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\"&gt;CLS&lt;/span&gt;\n            &lt;span style=\"color: ${getVitalColor('cls', cls)};\"&gt;${formatValue(cls, '', 3)}&lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &#96;\n  }\n\n  private renderDOM(): void {\n    const section = this.panel.querySelector('#stats-dom-section')\n    if (!section || !this.performanceData)\n      return\n\n    const { domNodes } = this.performanceData\n    const nodeColor = domNodes &gt; 1500 ? '#ff6b6b' : domNodes &gt; 800 ? '#ffd93d' : '#42b883'\n\n    section.innerHTML = &#96;\n      &lt;div style=\"margin-top: 8px; padding-top: 8px; border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1);\"&gt;\n        &lt;div style=\"display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: 10px;\"&gt;\n          &lt;span style=\"color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);\"&gt;DOM Nodes&lt;/span&gt;\n          &lt;span style=\"color: ${nodeColor};\"&gt;${domNodes.toLocaleString()}&lt;/span&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/div&gt;\n    &#96;\n  }\n\n  destroy(): void {\n    destroyFPSMonitor()\n    destroyPerformanceMonitor()\n\n    if (this.panel &amp;&amp; this.panel.parentNode) {\n      this.panel.parentNode.removeChild(this.panel)\n    }\n  }\n}\n\nlet statsPanel: StatsPanel | null = null\n\nexport function initStatsPanel(options?: StatsOptions): StatsPanel {\n  if (!statsPanel) {\n    statsPanel = new StatsPanel(options)\n  }\n  return statsPanel\n}\n\nexport function destroyStatsPanel(): void {\n  if (statsPanel) {\n    statsPanel.destroy()\n    statsPanel = null\n  }\n}\n\nexport { StatsPanel }\n",
